title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6403.7 - Cultural services contract
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6403.7 - Cultural services contract

State Regulations

Applicants that receive favorable funding decisions from the
council must enter into a cultural services contract with the council, detailing the obligations of the applicant upon receiving its grant. All
cultural services contracts require compliance with the New York State Finance

Law and the New York State Labor Law and prohibit discrimination by recipients
of council funds based on race, creed, color, national origin, sex, age, disability or marital status. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6403.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
